properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_MY_DIARY ( DIARY_NO, MEM_NO, CREATE_DATE, DIARY_TITLE, DIARY_CONTENT ) VALUES( SEQ_MY_DIARY.NEXTVAL, 3, DEFAULT, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO TB_FM_DIARY ( FAM_DIR_NO, MEM_NO, CREATE_DATE, FAM_DIR_TITLE, FAM_DIR_CONTENT ) VALUES( SEQ_TB_FM_DIARY.NEXTVAL, 2, SYSDATE, ?, ? )
SELECT DIARY_NO, DIARY_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM TB_MY_DIARY ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
